content: Vail Resorts Inc said it would buy Whistler Blackcomb Holdings Inc  operator of the ski resort that was a venue for the 2010 Olympic Winter Games  for about C$1.39 billion ($1.06 billion) to expand its mountain resort chain into Canada.
name: Vail Resorts Inc
title: Vail to buy Canadian ski resort operator Whistler Blackcomb

content: Aug 8 Vail Resorts Inc said it would buy Whistler Blackcomb Holdings Inc  operator of a year-round mountain resort in British Columbia  for about C$1.39 billion ($1.06 billion).

title: Vail Resorts to buy Whistler Blackcomb

content: SYDNEY  March 31 New York-listed Vail Resorts  will buy the largest mountain resort in Australia for $136 million in what will be its first international acquisition  the company said on Tuesday.
name: Vail Resorts Inc
title: Vail Resorts buys Australia's largest mountain resort

content: SYDNEY New York-listed Vail Resorts  on Tuesday said it would buy the largest mountain resort in Australia for $136 million  in its first international acquisition.
name: Vail Resorts Inc
title: Vail Resorts buys Australia's largest mountain resort
